net.kuujo.copycat.raft.log

Class LogConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kuujo.copycat.raft.log.LogConfig

  • public class LogConfig
extends Object
    Copycat storage configuration.

    The storage configuration is used to create log files, allocate disk space and predict disk usage for each segment in the log.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Detail

      • setDirectory

        public void setDirectory(String directory)
        Sets the log directory.

        The log will write segment files into the provided directory. It is recommended that a unique directory be dedicated for each unique log instance.

        Parameters:
        directory - The log directory.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the directory is null

      • setDirectory

        public void setDirectory(File directory)
        Sets the log directory.

        The log will write segment files into the provided directory. It is recommended that a unique directory be dedicated for each unique log instance.

        Parameters:
        directory - The log directory.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the directory is null

      • getDirectory

        public File getDirectory()
        Returns the log directory.

        The log will write segment files into the provided directory.

        Returns:
        The log directory. Defaults to System.getProperty("user.dir")

      • withDirectory

        public LogConfig withDirectory(String directory)
        Sets the log directory, returning the configuration for method chaining.

        The log will write segment files into the provided directory. It is recommended that a unique directory be dedicated for each unique log instance.

        Parameters:
        directory - The log directory.
        Returns:
        The log configuration.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the directory is null

      • setMaxEntrySize

        public void setMaxEntrySize(int maxEntrySize)
        Sets the maximum entry size.

        The maximum entry size will be used to place an upper limit on the size of log segments.

        Parameters:
        maxEntrySize - The maximum key size.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the maxEntrySize is not positive or is greater than getMaxSegmentSize()

      • getMaxEntrySize

        public int getMaxEntrySize()
        Returns the maximum entry size.

        The maximum entry size will be used to place an upper limit on the size of log segments. By default the maxEntrySize is 1024 * 8

        Returns:
        The maximum entry size.

      • withMaxEntrySize

        public LogConfig withMaxEntrySize(int maxEntrySize)
        Sets the maximum entry size, returning the configuration for method chaining.

        The maximum entry size will be used to place an upper limit on the size of log segments.

        Parameters:
        maxEntrySize - The maximum entry size.
        Returns:
        The log configuration.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the maxEntrySize is not positive

      • setMaxSegmentSize

        public void setMaxSegmentSize(int maxSegmentSize)
        Sets the maximum segment size.
        Parameters:
        maxSegmentSize - The maximum segment size.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the segment size is not positive or is less than getMaxEntrySize().

      • getMaxSegmentSize

        public int getMaxSegmentSize()

      • setMaxEntriesPerSegment

        public void setMaxEntriesPerSegment(int maxEntriesPerSegment)
        Sets the maximum number of allowed entries per segment.
        Parameters:
        maxEntriesPerSegment - The maximum number of allowed entries per segment.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the maximum number of entries per segment is greater than (int) (Math.pow(2, 31) - 1) / 8

      • getMaxEntriesPerSegment

        public int getMaxEntriesPerSegment()
        Returns the maximum number of entries per segment.
        Returns:
